name: GuakamoleCrew Demo 0.1
description:
This is the story of half an avocado going through a soulless world. The xanwa deities and nature will help it on its way. It will realize that the human is a danger.

Support Xbox Controller. Configure your controller similar or use keyboard.

Follow us! Instagram + Facebook

Visit our discord channel for bugs, general comments and system requirements (we are testing with what minimum requirements it works, you can help us by sending yours) https://discord.gg/xpbffk5
